data.name: DevCon Live
data.description: Inspired by the DevTalks network, DevCon is a premium event designed around a 3-days experience where senior IT professionals gather to share their best inputs and experiences and connect to the latest trends in technology and contribute to the future of the tech industry.

relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Day - Germany 2020
relatedRecords.description: Generelle InformationenDer AWS Community Day - Germany ist eine technische AWS Konferenz, veranstaltet als eintägiges Onlineevent und wird von der AWS User Group Community in der DACH Region organisiert. (Quasi ein "Meetup der Meetups"). Das Ziel des Community Days ist es den Erfahrun…

relatedRecords.name: Katherine Johnson Summit
relatedRecords.description: The mission of the Katherine Johnson Summit is to celebrate Black women in technology and provide a platform for us to learn, support, and uplift each other.

relatedRecords.name: Linaro Virtual Connect 2020
relatedRecords.description: Every six months, over 300 of the world’s leading open source engineers working on Arm get together for a full week of engineering sessions and hacking at Linaro Connect.
